title: AI on the Front Line: SAP’s Strategy for Customer Support
description: SAP’s customer support harnesses agentic AI to deliver smarter assistance, faster resolutions, and a stronger human–tech partnership.
content:
Were witnessing the AI revolution in customer support as it happens.
From decades of customer support defined by reaction to calls, tickets, or queues, to the evolution of proactive support with pre… [+7179 chars]
